content: HLC-HX SS304 Sleeve anchor Economical sleeve anchor (hex head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Stud type anchor design allows easy through-type fastenings and can be set in bottomless hole Hexagon head Pre-assembled anchor for easy and fast installation Anchor size is same as drill bit size for easy installation Comprehensively tested in block, masonry and concrete Applications Fastening in solid concrete and masonry ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Hex head, Hex head Environmental conditions: Outdoor Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | Hex head, Hex head | Environmental conditions | Outdoor | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Stainless steel, A2 | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening, Through-fastening ### ITEMS
